title: Ep 289: Tom Segura & The Hook Up
itunes:title: Ep 289: Tom Segura & The Hook Up
description:
Bobby makes love to Michael Phelps. Tom shows off his advanced podcasting techniques. Khalyla chooses Bert Kreischer, Gilbert, and Jamar Neighbors. We talk Catholics, closets, running from comedy, and the Austin exodus. We also play the first-ever edition of the 'Podcast Co-host, Life Companion, Lover' game. 

Sponsors:

For listeners of TigerBelly, Calm is offering a special limited time promotion of 40% off a Calm Premium subscription at calm.com/belly

Take care of your ED without leaving your home. Go to getroman.com/belly now, you’ll get $15 off your first month.
